A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Some cool visuals and good fight scenes can't
Balance out the forced humor\, bloated run time and plot holes which the audience is being told to overlook. For all the talk of a "bold new direction" we're still dealing with a Sith Lord leading an Empire against a young Jedi lesding a band of rebel forces. The film had an opportunity to go a different route but stuck with the same conflict we've seen in just about every SW movie. 

And on a personal note\, stop telling movie going audiences what they should like or demonizing them for not enjoying a movie as the critics did.
